commit.message:
re PR lto/67699 (ICE (segfault) compiling a const array with -flto)

2015-09-24  Richard Biener  <rguenther@suse.de>

	PR lto/67699
	* lto-cgraph.c (compute_ltrans_boundary): Do not stream
	abstract origins.

	* g++.dg/pr67699.C: New testcase.

From-SVN: r228084

files.patch:

+
+	PR lto/67699

+	abstract origins.
